name: Grappling Death
description:
Game was created for My First Game Jam - Winter 2019 in 2 weeks.

You're the last living human on our planet. But you're not alone! There are some guys that can be your friends. You just have to get them. Who cares that there're dead? Friendship is friendship. 

Special thanks to people from My First Game Jam Discord for all the support! <3
